overview:
Kenneth Shaw is the Co-founder and CEO of Tawkify, Inc. Tawkify is the old NEW way of meeting someone, where we personally handpick your match and set you up on a Tawkify, Walkify, or Mystery Date! Kenneth focuses on strategy, product, and technology.

In 2007, Kenneth co-built My Purity Test Facebook App that was one of the top 30 Facebook Apps in terms of users and sold it to Speeddate.com at the time when it had over 6 million users. He co-hosted two Facebook Developer Garages in Seattle.

Previously, he was the Principal Imagineer at One Kings Lane, where he was part of the core development team in bringing the technology in house and focused on ideation, fast prototyping, and optimization.

At Microsoft, he was the Product Planner for Microsoft Office, specializing in competitive intelligence and trends. His last year was spent planning for Office Labs.
